comments:
3.0 M7 
The PluginStopper is printing stack traces to the console. We should be logging
them. See bug 51985.

Fixed and released to HEAD.

For the error caused by the bug mentioned above, the following log entry will be
generated:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime.compatibility 4 1 Feb 16, 2004 12:13:44.459
